law.catch_line: On or before the 15th day of each regular session of the General Assembly, the Special Secretary sha...

text.section:
On or before the 15th day of each regular session of the General Assembly, the Special Secretary shall send an annual report on the Office of Minority Affairs:
to the Governor; and
subject to § 2-1246 of this article, to the General Assembly.
The annual report may be prepared in conjunction with the report required under § 14-305(b) of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
